import React from 'react' import '../styles/Details.css' import image from '../Assets/image.jpg' import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from 'react-tabs'; import { useState,useEffect } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import 'react-tabs/style/react-tabs.css'; export default function Details() { //hooks const[Restaurants,setRestaurants]=useState({}) let {rName}=useParams() //lifecycle hooks : componentDidMount an ComponentDidUpdate useEffect(()=>{ fetch(`http://localhost:9090/restaurant/details/${rName}`,{method:'GET'}) .then(response=>response.json()) .then(data=>setRestaurants(data.data)) },[])//dependenacy arry as blankthis useEffect behaves ike componentDidMount con const{name,thumb,cost,address,Cuisine}=Restaurants return (
